I got this for my daughter’s birthday. She is 5’6”, about 125 lbs and she usually wears a small. This top is so soft and has a good amount of stretch yet still has a good fitted feel. This is the only top you need for fall. The material is SO soft and feels like you’re wearing a sweater. It’s also super stretchy. You can definitely size down comfortably.
